definitions.definition: To design a new process or mechanism.
examples: After weeks of hard work, I invented a new way to alphabetize matchbooks.

definitions.definition: To create something fictional for a particular purpose.
examples: I knew I had to invent an excuse, and quickly.
We need a name to put in this form, so let's just invent one.

definitions.definition: To come upon ; to find; to discover.

main_definition: To design a new process or mechanism.
secondary_definitions: To create something fictional for a particular purpose.
( obsolete ) To come upon ; to find; to discover.
